details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.6.2.3 Schemas - All properties are defined
details.description: All properties specified in XMP form shall use either the predefined schemas defined in the XMP Specification, ISO 19005-1 or this part of ISO 19005, or any extension schemas that comply with 6.6.2.3.2.

rule.description: All properties specified in XMP form shall use either the predefined schemas defined in the XMP Specification, ISO 19005-1 or this part of ISO 19005, or any extension schemas that comply with 6.6.2.3.2.
rule.test: (isPredefinedInXMP2005 == true || isDefinedInMainPackage == true || isDefinedInCurrentPackage == true) && isValueTypeCorrect == true

error.message: An XMP property is either not not pre-defined, is not defined in any extension schema, or has invalid type.
